document_data.name: Uluevryn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Uluevryn''' family was one of the wealthiest families in [[Suldolphor]] in far eastern [[Calimshan]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Uluevryn estate lay along the affluent [[Emerald Dragon Way]] in the heart of the Golden City.
document_data.Notable Members: [[Dustras Uluevryn]] was a self-made merchant whose wealth surpassed those of all of his rivals within Suldolphor, placing his family above all others in terms of financial influence.
